projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: A collection of my recent work showcasing my skills in web development and design.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm a software developer based in London and relocating to Japan in September 2025. It all began in the midst of the pandemic when we were homebound. I decided to give the infamous CS50 course a go. Why not? A few online courses later, the only thing I was certain of was that I absolutely loved it. Closures? Not a clue. I threw myself into and embarked on a full-time diploma and built some cool stuff and met some cool people. I found myself working for a creative agency where my code became prettier and produced prettier looking thingsâ€¦
about.paragraph2: I'm extremely passionate about biodiversity and the environment and love to travel. I lived in Tokyo and Fukuoka for a few years from where a lot of my inspiration is now derived. I love gaming, snowboarding, coffee and movies (and ranking them). But spending time with my son makes all of that pale in comparison.
about.paragraph3: I work with React most of the time. I've released a productivity app onto Android, I'm creating a movie ranking application and I'm always looking at what's new in the land of frameworks.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision. Feel free to contact me using the form below.

contactForm.name: Name
contactForm.thankYou: I've got your message! I'll get back to you as soon as I can. . . :)
